title: Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved         NPS Volunteer and NPS Ranger at Val-Kill NPS   Volunteer:  Citizen Scientists - call Susanne Norris at 845-229-6873  Val-Kill Exhibit -   Trails & Rails - Call Mike Autenrieth at 845-229-7770  Gardens ( Frederick William Vanderbilt Garden Association, Beatrix Farrand Garden Association, Val-Kill  Garden, FDR Home Garden)  Interpretation - Vanderbilt Mansion, Home of Franklin D. Roosevelt, and Eleanor Roosevelt's Val-Kill  Education - call Susanne Norris at 845-229-6873  Application  Email Us for more information  Â    NPS Centennial - The National Park Service turns 100 on August 25, 2016.  As we lead up to the centennial, we invite you to participate in Find Your Park Experiences to learn, discover, be inspired, or simply have fun in National Parks. Support Your Park - You can help support the National Park Service and the Vanderbilt Mansion National Historic Site through a number of avenues.
